title: Idyllic Italian Country Escape with Wine & Olive Tasting, Walking Tour of Florence and Daily Breakfast
description: Soak up the beauty and history of Tuscany, staying in an ideal location within driving distance of Florence at the historic Tenuta Tizzauli - a restored countryside estate surrounded by olive groves, vineyards and the iconic Tuscan cypresses. Embrace the serene lifestyle and the region’s traditions with daily breakfast, a wine and olive tasting at Poggio Molina winery, a guided tour at Baus Beer micro-brewery with a beer tasting and exclusive discounts, a walking tour of Florence and complimentary parking.
offer_address: Via Barrucciano, Via Tizzavoli, 4, 50025 Montespertoli FI, Italy
